validation.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
validation.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 10 characters
validation.passwordMaxLength: Password must be less than 128 characters
validation.usernameMaxLength: Username must be less than 50 characters
validation.usernameInvalidChars: Username can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores

UserInfo.accountPreferencesDescription: Manage your account settings and preferences.
UserInfo.deleteAccountDescription: Permanently delete your account and all associated data.
UserInfo.deleteAccountConfirmationDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your account and remove your data from our servers.

create.organizationDescription: Create a new organization to manage your projects and teams.

validation.nameInvalidChars: Organization name can only contain letters, numbers, half-width spaces, underscores, and dashes

slug.invalidChars: Organization slug can only contain letters, numbers, and dashes
slug.invalidFormat: Organization slug must start and end with an alphanumeric character, and cannot contain hyphens at the beginning or end

Error.title: Oops, something went wrong :(
Error.queryError: We encountered a problem while fetching data: {message}
Error.mutationError: We encountered a problem while processing your request: {message}
Error.clientError: Please check your input and try again: {message}
Error.serverError: We're having some technical difficulties. Please try again later: {message}
Error.unknownError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved. Don't worry, even the best explorers get lost sometimes.
